description: Lily of the Nile (Agapanthus 'Blue Yonder') is an amazing plant species. It showcases beautiful flowers in shades of blue that stand tall against lush foliage. This perennial is exceptionally hearty, able to tolerate both frigid cold temperatures and harsh heat. It is also incredibly low-maintenance, as it only needs occasional pruning at the end of each season. Plus, it can be planted in almost any type of soil and enjoys full sun exposure, making it ideal for a variety of outdoor locations. With its striking colors and easy care, Lily of the Nile is truly a remarkable plant.
